Endless glow by Katie

You've never had a tan like this before

5 Tips for before preparing for your tan

  • 1. Wear dark loose fitting clothing to your appointment to avoid getting the color on your clothing.
  • 2. Try not to apply moisturizer the day of your tan because it can interfere with the absorption of the spray tan.
  • 3. Shave/wax beforehand because doing so after will remove the tan.
  • 4. Exfoliate from head to toe the day before you tan, focusing on knees, elbows and ankles. Moisturizer from head to two afterwards.
  • 5. If you want to get your tan for a special occasion, make your booking at least 2 days before to make sure that you are happy with your color. Also get all other beauty treatments done before your tan (i.e. Manicures and Pedicures)
  • **Remember to discuss all tan color options with your Spray Tan Technician to ensure you get the best results!

On the Fence?

The myth that sprays turn you orange is just that, a myth. Spray tans are a safe and healthy alternative to laying out all day, while still getting the confindence of that golden glow every girl wishes for come summer. Getting a custom airbrushed tan for your vacation, for your wedding, or just for yourself, is always a good iea. If you are not already obsessed with spray tanning, give us a call and we'll have you hooked.

5 tips for caring for your tan

  • 1. Donâ€™t get wet for several hours after your tan. If it is raining the day of your tan bring a big umbrella to cover you.
  • 2. Avoid activities that will naturally exfoliate the skin like bathing and chlorinated swimming pools for at least 12 hours.
  • 3. Avoid wearing any jewelry to the appointment and try not to wear jewelry for at least 8 hours after your tan
  • 4. After Showering, make sure that you pat dry with the towel, and avoid rubbing your skin vigorously.
  • 5. It is recommend that you use a tan extender after your tan and keep your skin moisturized to avoid the tan rubbing off due to dry skin
  • ** Always check with your technician about how long you should wait to shower after your tan!
